Detailed Description

template<typename KEY, typename VALUE, typename PAIR_TRAITS, typename TRAITS, class ALLOCATOR>
class cds::ordered_list::MichaelList< gc::tagged_gc, KEY, VALUE, PAIR_TRAITS, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR >

Lock-free ordered single-linked list developed by Michael.

The implementation is based on Tagged Pointers memory reclamation schema

Source
[2002] Maged Michael "High performance dynamic lock-free hash tables and list-based sets"

This class is used as the collision list in some lock-free hash map implementation.

Template parameters
  • KEY type of key stored in list
  • VALUE type of value stored in list
  • PAIR_TRAITS (key, value) pair traits. The default is cds::map::pair_traits <KEY, VALUE>
  • TRAITS list traits. The default is cds::ordered_list::type_traits
  • ALLOCATOR node allocator. The default is std::allocator.
This implementation uses the following types defined in TRAITS:
  • backoff_strategy - back-off strategy. The default is cds::backoff::Default
  • free_list_type - free-list implementation. The default is cds::gc::tagged::FreeList. You may set TRAITS::free_list_type as a reference to free-list type. In such case the MichaelList will use shared free-list object provided by you. Note, that free-list type you provide should have rebind< Q, B > template to rebuild template parameters of free-list. See cds::gc::tagged::FreeList::rebind.
For class members documentation see details::michael_list_tagged::list_base
Common interface: see Ordered list common interface.
